org.drip.spline.params

Class SegmentStateCalibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spline.params.SegmentStateCalibration

  • public class SegmentStateCalibration
extends java.lang.Object
    SegmentStateCalibration implements basis per-segment Calibration Parameter Set. It exposes the following functionality: - Retrieve the Array of the Calibration Predictor Ordinates. - Retrieve the Array of the Calibration Response Values. - Retrieve the Array of the Left/Right Edge Derivatives. - Retrieve the Segment Best Fit Response. - Retrieve the Array of Segment Basis Flexure Constraints.
